Topic Summary: Appellant is appealing Revenue's refusal to allow him exclusion from Mandatory Electronic Filing requirements to file returns and make payments electronically.
Tax Legislation: Section 917EA of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (as amended) Mandatory Electronic Filing and Payment of Tax; Tax Returns and Payments (Mandatory Electronic Filing and Payment of Tax) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 156 of 2012) - Subsections 2, 5 and 7.
